item.description: Boston Atheists meetup members -- especially folks new to the group -- are invited to gather for dinner at drinks each month on the first Friday. This time around, we'll be at Porter Square Tavern, conveniently located just off the Red Line. We've reserved a section with high-top tables near the bar, which is ideally suited both for people who want to sit and dine with friends, or who want to put their beer down and mingle a bit. If you have any trouble finding us, call me at 617-935-4951.
item.name: First Friday Mixer: Porter Square
